评论详情: The shirt material is extremely stiff, I expected it to be much more “flowy”. The graphics are average, it’s NOT at all like Nike or UA. It was for a specific person and they won’t ever wear it. I won’t even bother with a return as it was washed and still didn’t help. Just one more shirt for the closet. Maybe look elsewhere.
Logo on shirt was totally off centered.
Very disappointed!  Delivery took over 2 weeks and the material was very cheap, not Nike quality!  Over priced for inferior product!
